sentences.english: Today he is the prime mover in China's most prestigious think tank.
sentences.chinese: 今天他是中國最有聲望的智庫中主要的活動家。

sentences.english: 《New Weekly》said, think tank is the brain of a country.
sentences.chinese: 《新週刊》說，智庫是一個國家的智商。

sentences.english: The information provided by Savantas on this website is for reference only .
sentences.chinese: 匯賢智庫在本網頁提供的資料只供參考。

sentences.english: Pro. Wang Yurong said, China is entering a new era that the whole society is influenced by think tank.
sentences.chinese: 王玉榮說，中國正在進入嶄新的智庫影響社會時代。

sentences.english: The green recovery plan was incubated at a liberal thinktank, the Centre for American Progress.
sentences.chinese: 綠色恢復計劃在自由派智庫美國進步中心孕育產生。

sentences.english: I invite the thinktanks to prove me wrong.
sentences.chinese: 希望智庫可以證明我是錯的。

sentences.english: It. s one of the premiere technology think tanks in the world.
sentences.chinese: 它是技術之一的首演中智庫世界。

sentences.english: The earthquake hit the Great Ape House and Think Tank Exhibit during afternoon feeding time.
sentences.chinese: 下午餵食的時候，地震襲擊了類人猿館和智庫展覽。

definition: special administrative region/abbr. for 特別行政區|特别行政区

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

definition: (political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
